name: 2020-2021 University Portfolio games
description:
Collection of games made in one to two weeks each (Rapid prototyping method). 

Angry Geese - A 

Brewster - Mobile game for Android for the prompt "Infinite Runner"

Foxy the Savage - A three week project that fleshed out turn-based battle mechanics, communication design, and level design.

Indlela - An Ndebele inspired symmetry game created from the prompt of "African Puzzle Game" 

Stupid Stapler - A staple shooting game based on the prompt "Non-violent and non-gun related FPS"

Wobbly Waiter - Mechanically experimental game exploring the topic of "Simulation with a complex mechanic"
